head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARINO, NICHOLAS S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARINO, NICHOLAS S.

block.p: MARINO-Nicholas S. Age 80 of Montville (NJ). Beloved husband of Mildred (Stefano), father of Richard, Robert, Dennis, Donald and Lorraine Thierry, brother f Gerard and Carmela Riccardo. The funeral will be Wednesday 9AM at the Keri Memorial Home, 125 Main Street, Lincoln Park and 10AM Mass in St. Pius X Church, Montville. Visiting hours Tuesday, 2-4 and 7-9PM.
